mapper.select: SELECT ARTICLE.ARTICLE_SEQ, ARTICLE.TITLE, ARTICLE.SUMMARY, ARTICLE.URL, ARTICLE.HASHTAG, ARTICLE.CATEGORY_SEQ, TO_CHAR(ARTICLE.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DATE, CATE.CATEGORY, FM.FILE_CONTENTS, FM.FILE_EXT FROM ARTICLE ARTICLE, FILE_MANAGEMENT FM, CATEGORY CATE WHERE ARTICLE.ARTICLE_SEQ = #{articleSeq} AND ARTICLE.FILE_SEQ = FM.FILE_SEQ(+) AND ARTICLE.CATEGORY_SEQ = CATE.CATEGORY_SEQ(+) AND ARTICLE.DEL != 1
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO USER_LEARNING UL USING ( SELECT USER_LEARNING_SEQ FROM USER_LEARNING WHERE ARTICLE_SEQ = #{articleSeq} ) D ON ( UL.USER_LEARNING_SEQ = D.USER_LEARNING_SEQ ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET LAST_LEARNING_DATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( USER_LEARNING_SEQ, EMAIL, ARTICLE_SEQ, LAST_LEARNING_DATE ) VALUES ( USER_LEARNING_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{articleSeq}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ARTICLE_SEQ) FROM USER_VOCA WHERE ARTICLE_SEQ = #{articleSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_VOCA( USER_VOCA_SEQ, USER_LEARNING_SEQ, ARTICLE_SEQ, VOCA ) SELECT USER_VOCA_PK_SEQ.nextval AS USER_VOCA_SEQ, USER_LEARNING_SEQ, ARTICLE_SEQ, VOCA FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT UL.USER_LEARNING_SEQ, ARTI_VOCA.ARTICLE_SEQ, VOCA.VOCA FROM ARTICLE_VOCABOOK ARTI_VOCA, VOCABOOK VOCA, USER_LEARNING UL WHERE ARTI_VOCA.MEANING_NUM = VOCA.MEANING_NUM AND UL.ARTICLE_SEQ = ARTI_VOCA.ARTICLE_SEQ AND ARTI_VOCA.ARTICLE_SEQ = #{articleSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_VOCA_SEQ, USER_LEARNING_SEQ, ARTICLE_SEQ, VOCA, CHECK_READING, LAST_VOCA FROM USER_VOCA WHERE ARTICLE_SEQ = #{articleSeq}
